@pixi/canvas-renderer > PIXI > canvasUtils

PIXI.canvasUtils 

namespace canvasUtils

Utility methods for Sprite/Texture tinting.

Tinting with the CanvasRenderer involves creating a new canvas to use as a texture, so be aware of the performance implications.

Summary

Properties from canvasUtils

number
static cacheStepsPerColorChannel = 8

Number of steps which will be used as a cap when rounding colors.
boolean
static canUseMultiply

Whether or not the Canvas BlendModes are supported, consequently the ability to tint using the multiply method.
boolean
static convertTintToImage = false

Tint cache boolean flag.
Function
static tintMethod

The tinting method that will be used.

Methods from canvasUtils

HTMLCanvasElement
static getTintedCanvas(sprite: PIXI.Sprite, color: number)

Basically this method just needs a sprite and a color and tints the sprite with the given color.
HTMLCanvasElement
static getTintedPattern(texture: PIXI.Texture, color: number)

Basically this method just needs a sprite and a color and tints the sprite with the given color.
number
static roundColor(color: number)

Rounds the specified color according to the canvasUtils.cacheStepsPerColorChannel.
void
static tintWithMultiply(texture: PIXI.Texture, color: number, canvas: HTMLCanvasElement)

Tint a texture using the 'multiply' operation.
void
static tintWithOverlay(texture: PIXI.Texture, color: number, canvas: HTMLCanvasElement)

Tint a texture using the 'overlay' operation.
void
static tintWithPerPixel(texture: PIXI.Texture, color: number, canvas: HTMLCanvasElement)

Tint a texture pixel per pixel.
